config.betterthanllamas.cat.general.name: General settings
config.betterthanllamas.cat.general.desc: These options are general settings that don't fit any other category.
config.betterthanllamas.cat.outfit.name: Outfit Settings
config.betterthanllamas.cat.outfit.desc: Settings regarding llamas that are wearing outfits
config.betterthanllamas.prop.applyOn.des:
Apply Mod On...
0 = Nothing (why install the mod though?)
1 = Llamas
2 = Trader Llamas
3 = Both
config.betterthanllamas.prop.fancyChance: Chance of llamas wearing parts of their outfit, in percentage% (0-100)
config.betterthanllamas.prop.hatChance.d: Chance of llamas wearing hats in their outfit, in percentage% (0-100)
config.betterthanllamas.prop.monocleChan: Chance of llamas wearing a monocle in their outfit, in percentage% (0-100)
Chance of llamas having a pipe in their outfit, in percentage% (0-100)
config.betterthanllamas.prop.bowtieChanc: Chance of llamas wearing a bow tie in their outfit, in percentage% (0-100)
config.betterthanllamas.prop.fezChance.d: Chance of llamas wearing a fez in their outfit, in percentage% (0-100)
config.betterthanllamas.prop.moustacheCh: Chance of llamas wearing a moustache in their outfit, in percentage% (0-100)
